12:01 <tmortagne> sdumitriu: Hi  
12:02 <tmortagne> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/01465e255bc02c6fbfb3e8edc0cd612655f511f0#diff-4507860fbce1bffc7edf24dfff504ddbL37 looks like a mistake  
12:02 <tmortagne> that's JAX-RS 2 artifact id  
12:03 <tmortagne> we can't move to JAX-RS 2 as I explained in the dedicated jira issue and anyway there is no dependency management for this artifact id so this cannot build since it does not have the version  
12:05 <tmortagne> reverting this change for now since platform is unusable with it
